pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Cython bindings for MurmurHash2[![tests](https://github.com/explosion/murmurhash/actions/workflows/tests.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/explosion/murmurhash/actions/workflows/tests.yml)[![pypi Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/murmurhash.svg?style=flat-square&logo=pypi&logoColor=white)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/murmurhash)[![conda Version](https://img.shields.io/conda/vn/conda-forge/murmurhash.svg?style=flat-square&logo=conda-forge&logoColor=white)](https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/murmurhash)[![Python wheels](https://img.shields.io/badge/wheels-%E2%9C%93-4c1.svg?longCache=true&style=flat-square&logo=python&logoColor=white)](https://github.com/explosion/wheelwright/releases)
